This watch is analog of the legendary Zenith Chronometer Cal. 135 of 1950. The watch in fully working order – you can use it for everyday wearing; or if you are collector of watch will super addition to your collection - the price of this watch increases every year. It has chromed case, on a face - plastic. The dial is original. The movement - mechanical, with manual winding, super quality. The watch has been serviced. This Volna watch is used but are in good working and cosmetic condition as seen on the images below. Watchband is added as a gift.
